item.title: Guillermo del Toronto Gets Toronto Soundstages Renamed in Horror Meister’s Honor
item.description: The maestro of monsters’ name now adorns film stages where he shot ‘Nightmare Alley,’ ‘Cabinet of Curiosities’ and more recently ‘Frankenstein’ for Netflix.
